sentences.sContent: To the left of the port, a dry stone stairway leads to the ruins, through the mastic trees and broom.
sentences.sContent_eng: To the left of the port, a dry stone stairway leads to the ruins, through the mastic trees and broom.
sentences.sCn: 在港口的左边，一段用石头搭建的楼梯穿过乳香树和金雀花从，通向建筑遗迹。

trans.tranOther: a large brush with a long handle, used for sweeping floors
